title: Keen Dreams Sprites
content: Can some1 point the way to a dl of Keen dreams graphics, in .bmp format; I need the item images, which are animated. CKU has them in .gif, but you know, .bmp is ideal.- .... . / ..-  -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.

title: Re: Keen Dreams Sprites
content:
I know of two places that has keen dreams sprites.

[url=http://www.fragile-minds.com/crashnbass/downloads.php]www.fragile-minds.com[/url]

[url=http://www.panelmonkey.org/category.php?id=1]www.panelmonkey.org[/url]

Save them as .bmp

title: Re: Keen Dreams Sprites
content: i didn't see the items on there, only the sprites of keen himself and other miscellaneous for Keen Dreams- .... . / ..-  -. .. ...- . .-. ... . / .. ... / - --- .- ... - / .-.

title: Re: Keen Dreams Sprites
content:
I thought they might have item sprites.

Here's a idea, take a .gif seperate it and save each pic as a .bmp

Try this place, it's free: [url=http://www.gifworks.com/]GIFWORKS[/url]

title: Re: Keen Dreams Sprites
content: Try the [url=http://andy.durdin.net/keen/modding/viewtopic.php?t=452]Keen Dreams version of ModKeen[/url]. Takes a moment to merge each image with its transparency mask so you get the outlines, but it's the most direct way of getting the graphics.
